nl: Let $Y$ be an ordered set in the order topology. Let $f, g: X \rightarrow Y$ be continuous. Let $h: X \rightarrow Y$ be the function $h(x)=\min \{f(x), g(x)\}.$ Show that $h$ is continuous.
candidate: ∀ (Y : Type*) [LinearOrderedAddCommGroup Y] [TopologicalSpace Y] [OrderTopology Y] {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {f g : X → Y} (hf : Continuous f) (hg : Continuous g), Continuous fun x => min (f x) (g x)
imports:
import Mathlib

open Filter Set TopologicalSpace
open scoped Topology
